sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Button, Card, Col, ListGroup, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import { Store } from '../Store'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { state, dispatch: ctxDispatch } = useContext(Store); const { cart, userInfo } = state; const placeOrderHandler = async () => { }; useEffect(() => { if (!cart.paymentMethod) navigate('/payment'); }, [navigate, cart]); return
Order Preview

Order Preview

Shipping

Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

Edit Payment

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

 Edit Cart {cart.cartItems.map((item) => ( {' '} {item.name} {item.quantity} ${item.price} ))} Edit Order Summary Items ${cart.itemsPrice.toFixed(2)} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice.toFixed(2)} Tax ${cart.taxPrice.toFixed(2)}
}
